div.p: AS YOU KNOW, TOMORROW THE BIG DAY WHEN THE SUPREME COURT WILL DECIDE WHETHER OBAMA'S HEALTH
CARE REFORM IS CONSTITUTIONAL OR NOT.
WHETHER THE COURT RULES FOR OR AGAINST THE LAW, ONE THING WE KNOW FOR SURE--
>> THURSDAY IS SHAPING UP TO BE A BIG NEWS DAY.
>> WE'RE GETTING IT, THURSDAY IS THE DAY.
>> ALL EYES ARE ON THIS ONE.
>> IS IT OKAY I'M SO EXCITED ABOUT THIS?
>> SHOULD WE JUST SKIP WEDNESDAY AND GO STRAIGHT FOR THURSDAY?
THURSDAY IS THE ONLY IMPORTANT DAY OF THE WEEK.
YOU BOTH LOOK EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE ON THOSE STOOLS.
AND, SECOND, YOU'RE GOING TO SKIP STRAIGHT TO THURSDAY.
GEE, THAT SOUNDS LIKE THE PERFECT USE FOR THE TIME MACHINE YOU APPARENTLY HAVE.
I'M SORRY, KILLING HITLER WILL HAVE TO WAIT.
( LAUGHTER ) THERE'S A SUPREME COURT OPINION 24 HOURS AWAY.
SO WHO COOKED BLAME THE MEDIA FOR BEING PUMPED.
>> THIS COULD BE A WIN-WIN FOR THE PRESIDENT.
>> WHATEVER HAPPENS IT'S A WIN-WIN FOR ROMNEY.
>> A WIN IS A WIN AND A LOSS IS A LOSS.
>> A LOSS COULD BE A GAIN.
>> IT'S PRETTY UNLIKELY THE COURT WILL STRIKE DOWN THE ENTIRE LAW.
>> THE COURT COULD DECIDE TO UPHOLD OR STRIKE THE ENTIRE LAW.
>> WILL HE JOIN TO MAKE IT SIX SO IT DOESN'T LOOK LIKE ONE OF
THOSE 5-4 RULINGS IN I DON'T KNOW.
MAYBE THE CHIEF JUSTICE WILL KILL THE OTHER FOUR, OR A JUST WILL BE REANIMATED FROM THE DEAD DEAD.
OR ONE OF THE JUSTICES WILL BE IN A CAR CRASH AND THE OTHERS WILL SAY I CAN'T RULE ON THIS
JUSTICE, HE'S MY SON, BECAUSE THE JUSTICE IS A WOMAN.
( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE ) IT'S ALL SO EXCITING!
FOR ANSWERS WE GO TO SENIOR JUDICIAL CORRESPONDENT JESSICA WILLIAMS OUTSIDE THE SUPREME COURT.
IS THERE ANY INDICATION HOW THE JUSTICES ARE LEANING TONIGHT?
I'M PRETTY SURE THEY'RE HORIZONTAL, AS IN SLEEPING,
BECAUSE IT'S NIGHT TIME AND THAT'S WHAT YOU DO WHEN YOU'RE NOT STUCK OUTSIDE OF AN
DON'T WORRY, JON, WE'LL ALL KNOW TOMORROW MORNING.
>> YOU NEED TO CALM THE ( BLEEP ) DOWN.
WE'LL KNOW IN LESS THAN 12 HOURS.
>> Jon: THERE HAS TO BE ADVANCE WORK, WHAT DO THE CLERK SAYS.
ARE ANY OF THE JUSTICES ON THE KILL LIST--
>> HOLD OJON, I AM GETTING BREAKING NEWS.
CHIEF JUSTICE ROBERTS IS ANNOUNCING A 7-2 DECISION THAT YOU NEED TO CALM THE ( BLEEP ) DOWN.
>> Jon: SO TWO OF THE JUSTICES AGREE WITH ME, THEN.
JUST TELL ME THIS-- IF THEY DO OVERTURN OBAMACARE, WHO BENEFITS THE MOST, ROMNEY OR OBAMA?
THERE'S NO WAY TO ANSWER THAT QUESTION WITHOUT MAKE UP A BUMP OF ( BLEEP ) UP.
>> Jon: THE RULING, THE EFFECTS ON THE CAMPAIGN WILL BE MEANINGLESS, TIME-KILLING ( BLEEP )?
TOMORROW OBAMACARE WILL BE OVERTURNED HANDING THE ELECTION TO MITT ROMNEY.
>> Jon: YOU ARE OUT ON A LIMB.
>> WHAT WILL JESUS SAY ABOUT THE RULING?
>> HE WILL SAY AS HE SAID ORIGINALLY IN THE FIRST SERMON ON THE MOUNTAIN, MATTHEW 5:7.
